title: PBE Sign Up page is down

embed.description: The Public Beta Environment (PBE) is a limited-access public League of Legends realm where players help us test "declassified" features, content and experiments that aren't yet (and may never be) ready for prime time.

body: I was wondering if anyone has noticed that the pbe page is down. Is it only up when Rito is accepting new testers? or is it supposed to be always up?

replies.body: The signup page should always be up. It wasn't down when I clicked the link just now. Can you try a different browser to see if you still have trouble accessing it? If so, can you send me a screenshot of what you're getting?

Here I've tried it on mobile, I've tried while logged in, from the link in the drop down when you click your username in the top right, I've tried while not logged in from the link I've posted, and I've tried while logged in from the link I've posted.

http://imgur.com/slINM3c

I've gotten an error 500 every time. I've only started trying since yesterday. I was hoping waiting a day would help.

And i have just tried it on my GF's mac, with her account **[redacted]** and my account with safari and google chrome.

http://imgur.com/a/ZCn1z

So now thats three devices with chrome, one attempt with firefox, and one attempt with safari. All give me error 500

Oh and I've tried going to pbe.boards.leagueoflegends.com and clicking Log In->create account->Region PBE and same page, error 500

Interesting. I suspect this may be caused by something in your route to the server. To test this, you can try a force reroute of your connection by using a Virtual Private Network (VPN). I can't provide support for these programs, but I recommend trying them to see if you can bypass the error you're seeing.

I recommend trying the VPN's below:

>[Hot Spot Shield](http://www.hotspotshield.com/) is a free service, but players report mixed results.
[CyberGhost](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/en_us) has a free option.


Let me know if anything changed.
I've been wondering about the same thing. I've been trying to check on the status of my PBE application, but it's been down this whole time.
Down as in you get the same error as posted above? Or do you see a different error entirely?

Yeah, it's the same one. It takes a long time to load, and then shows this:

http://imgur.com/a/RRaXF

Can you try one of the VPN's I linked above and let me know if they bypassed the issue? If they didn't try using [incognito mode](https://support.google.com/chrome/answer/95464?source=gsearch&hl=en) or [clearing your browser's data](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies).

Let me know what did or didn't work for you.
so i put cyberghost on my mobile and successfully applied for PBE. Thanks for your help.

I am on linux and a vpn will be a bit harder for me to set up. I don't see how a vpn will help tho, i had my friend who lives an hour away from me (different isp than me) try it and then my gf who also lives an hour away try it. and i tried it on my mobile using the cell network, not wi fi. so these are 4 different ISPs getting the same error. I will try and see if i can get a vpn up on my linux
and now my friend d3m0n0gr4ph1c just tried and its down for him too
And I just had my brother try it and it didn't work on his account either.
